The image was published on June 22: 2020, and has been shared more than 2,300 times.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image translates to English as a claim about Russian scientists resurrecting a 32,000-year-old flower.
The same image was shared in multiple po: 4. A reverse image search on Google found that the photo is a Getty Images picture titled "Purple Arctic Flowers and Icebergs from Jakobshavn Glacier - stock photo," with no mention of the purported study by Russian scientists.
